name: 光之迷城 / Dawn of the Lost Castle
description: "Dawn of the Lost Castle" is an adventure puzzle, trying to solve all the mysteries in the castle to understand the story of the castle.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win7 SP1 or higher. Processor: CPU Intel Core i3-4010U Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 or AMD Radeon R7 360 or more; Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win10 or higher. Processor: CPU Intel Core i7-6700 or AMD FX 8370 or more; Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon R9 380 or more; Storage: 1 GB available space
